Module.Content:
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>Title</title>
    <script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/3.2.1/jquery.min.js"></script>
</head>
<body>
<script>
    function post(json) {
        $.post("http://revelvendingapi.azurewebsites.net/api/transactions",json,
            function (data, status) {
                alert("Data: " + data + "\nStatus: " + status);
            });
    }
</script>
</body>
</script>
